title: Projects
text: A small personal project utilizing tidy data principles followed by univariate regression to predict winners in the League of Legends LCK. Click here to open in a new tab!

ğŸ“ˆ Cal Poly Stat Club Treasurer Candidacy
Already being a year-long member of Cal Poly Stat Club, I am driven by my desire to engage better with other members while improving membership quality. My platform promises to introduce more fundraising opportunities both big and small along with transparency in fund expenditure, among many other minor quality-of-life changes.

title: Ruben Jimenez
text:
Howdy!
Welcome to my domain! Make yourself comfortable and allow me to introduce both myself and my projects. Feel free to connect with me via LinkedIn, GitHub, or email!

title: About
text: My name is Ruben Jimenez (he/him/his), and I am a sophomore Statistics undergraduate at Cal Poly. I take great interest in mathematics, statistics, and economics, and the real-world implications behind modeling and data visualization. Come with me as I figure out how to apply my specialized knowledge to personal interests.
